attributes.action: PASS A VOTE OF NO CONFIDENCE IN THE GOVERNMENT.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
PASS A VOTE OF NO CONFIDENCE IN THE GOVERNMENT.
Too many reasons too list, if you live in Briton, previously known as the "United" Kingdom, you know them all too well.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
